meanings.definition: A person who perverts something, especially sexually.
meanings.sent1: The perverters were caught in the act by the police.
meanings.sent2: The community was shocked to discover the perverters living among them.
meanings.sent3: The perverters tried to sneak into the movie theater without paying.
meanings.sent4: The perverters twisted the truth to suit their own desires.
meanings.sent5: The perverters' actions left a stain on the reputation of the town.

meanings.definition: Those who corrupt or distort something.
meanings.sent1: The perverters of justice were finally brought to justice themselves.
meanings.sent2: It is important to identify and stop the perverters of truth.
meanings.sent3: The perverters of fashion thought wearing socks with sandals was a good idea.
meanings.sent4: The perverters of nature left a trail of destruction in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The perverters of art painted over the masterpiece with graffiti.
